decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( 989/X01, 989/X100, 989/X101, 989/OD100, 989/OD101, Received 10/11/2018 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No development shall take place until samples of all materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details

Condition : 4 - Prior to the occupation of the development, full details of the cycle storage detailing the layout and shelter for the cycle spaces required by the site shall be submitted and approved by the local authority. The spaces shall be built out as approved.
Condition : 5 - The rooflight proposed shall be conservation style fitted flush to the roofslope and maintained as such.
description: Listed building consent for internal alterations to alter the location of the existing office and residential units, creation of additional residential unit on second floor and erection of side roof extension to western roof slope
